title: Fantasista Doll
original_name: ファンタジスタドール
sinopse:
Uzume Uno describes herself as a normal middle-schooler with the special trait of just being normal. However, that was until she makes a contract with 5 girls sealed in cards, and becomes their master. Along with her Dolls, she must fight against adversaries that come to steal the cards.

(Source: ANN)
